#include<iostream>
#include<cstdio>
#include<cstdlib>
#include <vector>
#include<math.h>
int m=8388608;
using namespace std;
int MOD(int n)
{

    unsigned long long temp;
    int rem2;
    temp=((n*(n+1))/2)%m;


        rem2=pow(2,n-1);



    return((temp*rem2)%m);




}
int main()
{
    int t;
    int n,i,sum;
    unsigned long long prod;
    cin>>t;
    while(t--)
    {
       cin>>n;
       sum=0;
       if(n>=23)
        {
            n=22;
        }

       for(i=1;i<=n;i++)
       {
           sum=sum+MOD(i);
           sum=sum%m;
       }
       cout<<sum<<"\n";



    }




    return(0);
}
